title: Old Macintosh font?
content:
Hi,

I would like your help identifying this font... I think it's the old Macintosh font but Im not sure.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820105548im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_5672.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820105548im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font2_4919.png)
author: nolete

comments.content: Thanks Michel! I couldn't remember it.
Only use it if you're being uber-ironic.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820105548im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Chicago_4178.jpg)
  
According to Identifont, Chicago is no longer supplied with the Mac but the Thai font Krungthep supplied with Mac OS 10 has the same Latin characters.  
Don
